maqras.text: In Joseph his frater ibi est lessons seekers
They dictus Joseph his frater favored noster patris nos est majoritatatis! Indeed noster patris est far astray
kill Joseph banish eum ut vos get some attention ex tuus patris! Afterwards vos est righteous people
de them dictus non kill Joseph; throw eum abyss bene! Perhaps some caravan pick eum hoc est quod vos decide perfecit
They dictus Noster patris vos non trust nos Joseph? Nos take bonus care de eum
Send eum nos cras run play Nos protect eum
He dictus ego injuria lest vos iit eum tunc wolf devour eum dum vos non watching eum
They dictus Indeed wolf devours eum multus de nos circiter tunc nos est really losers
When they iit eum ac unanimously decided throw eum into abyss bene nos inspired eum Some feria vos tell them totus hoc dum they non habet idea
They advenit their patris in the et weeping
They dictus Noster patris nos iit genus each alius sinister Joseph noster equipment wolf devoured eum! Vos nunquam believe nos et nos telling truth

They produced his shirt fake blood it He dictus Indeed vos conspired each alius to commit certain scheme totus ego perfecit est resort to quiet patience! Maius DEUS help me in the face de tuus conspiracy
caravan passed soon sent their waterer! He let his bucket tunc dictus Quam lucky ibi est garcio hic! They took eum along merchandise DEUS est fully aware de quod they perfecit
They sold eum cheap price - ut few dirhams - Pro they non habet any need pro eum

Unus bought eum Egypt dictus to his uxor Take bonus care de eum. Maybe he help nos maybe nos adopt eum. Nos ergo established Joseph terra nos taught eum interpretation de dreams Deus command semper perfecit multus people non know
When he reached maturity nos endowed eum cum wisdom knowledge. Nos sic reward the righteous
Domina domus he vivens tried seduce eum! She clausum doors dictus ego est totus yours. He dictus maius DEUS protect me! He est my Dominus dedit me bonus domus. transgressors nunquam succeed
She fere succumbed eum ac he fere succumbed eam si non est he vide proof ex his Dominus. Nos sic diverted malus sin away eum he est 1 de noster devoted servus
de them genus door process she tore his garment ex back They invenit eam maritus door. She dictus Quod punishment 1 qui wanted molest tuus uxor imprisonment painful punishment
He dictus She est unus tried seduce me. testis ex eam familia suggested his garment est torn ex front tunc she telling truth he est liar
Ac si his garment est torn ex back tunc she lied he telling truth
When eam maritus vide his garment est torn ex back he dictus Hoc est femina scheme Indeed tuus scheming est formidable
Joseph disregard hoc incident Prout pro vos (my uxor) vos seek forgiveness tuus sin Vos committed erratum
